title: Osbourne Fleming
text: Osbourne Berrington Fleming (born February 18, 1940) is a politician and a former <a href="Chief%20Minister%20of%20Anguilla">chief minister of Anguilla</a>. He held that post from March 6, 2000, three days after the <a href="Anguilla%20United%20Front">Anguilla United Front</a>, a <a href="conservatism">conservative</a> coalition which included Fleming's <a href="Anguilla%20National%20Alliance">Anguilla National Alliance</a> won parliamentary elections, gaining at least 4 of the 7 seats, until February 15 2010 in which he retired from his seat as the chief minister of Anguilla. Mr. Fleming was a prominent and successful businessman prior to entering politics. He served for many years as Minister of Finance before winning election as Anguilla's Chief Minister.
